Music

A Day at the Theme Park

This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

This was one of the first pieces I ever made. I created this back in middle school, although I have personally never played either part in its entirety. When I first wrote this duet, both parts of it were just barely within my technical ability.

My inspiration was from my memories from going to Cedar Point as a young child, when I was about 7-9 years old. I missed going there then, and I still wish I could get a chance to go now, just to relive some of the best parts of my childhood.
